quoteText: <li>You agree to defend (at our request), indemnify and hold us harmless from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses, including without limitation, reasonable attorney's fees and costs, arising out of or in any way connected with these Terms or your use of the Service.
title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
